main: Killing with her S3's second coin reuses it on another target with {status:MarkOfButler} (max once).

Passive makes hits on enemies with {status:MarkOfButler} give her {status:Breath} Count and {status:Agility}. Crits consume {status:MarkOfButler} to deal bonus damage based on her speed over the target's.
other: Skills gain Power based on speed difference, making {status:MarkOfButler} useful to give her {status:Agility}.

1040801.desc:
On Hit against targets with [MarkOfButler], gain 1 [Agility] next turn (3 times per turn)
On Crit against targets with [MarkOfButler], eliminate [MarkOfButler] on target; then, if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +5% Damage on Critical Hit for every 1 Speed difference (max 30%)
1040801.name: Clearing Household Chores

1040811.desc:
On Hit against targets with [MarkOfButler], gain +1 [Breath] Count, and gain 1 [Agility] next turn (3 times per turn)
On Crit against targets with [MarkOfButler], eliminate [MarkOfButler] on target; then, if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +10% Damage on Critical Hit for every 1 Speed difference (max 60%)
1040811.name: Clearing Household Chores

1040821.desc: When the ally that was deployed last wins a Clash, gain +1 [Breath] Count (3 times per turn)
1040821.name: Cleaning Command

1040831.desc: When the ally that was deployed last wins a Clash, gain +1 [Breath] Count (3 times per turn), and gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
1040831.name: Cleaning Command
